column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you knew my mother
column2: you'd know that pizza loving is in my blood. Seriously
column3: and this doesn't disapoint. This is the best deep dish I have ever had in Chicago
column4: the ingredients are very high quality and sets themselves apart from the pack! We had the recommended pizza with sausage and buttercrust- The sauce on top had chunks of roma tomatoes in it
column5: that was my favorite part! We ordered a medium for the two of us and had plenty left over to nibble on ALL weekend long.
